style: font-size: 16px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 14.26%;top: 3.42%;width: 12.65%;height: 4.61%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.63%;top: 4.35%;width: 6.80%;height: 3.10%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 34.55%;top: 3.76%;width: 8.95%;height: 4.86%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: bold;

text:
おいおい
マズい物見られて
言い訳は
分かるけど
それは
ちょっと…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 32.52%;top: 24.71%;width: 14.20%;height: 10.23%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
良い匂いは
これか。
マンドラゴラ
フルーツ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 52.45%;top: 4.93%;width: 12.41%;height: 7.63%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
他人に
あげないはずだ。
お前ら１つのアイテム（カップル）か?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 51.49%;top: 19.60%;width: 15.04%;height: 7.04%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 11px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 63.42%;top: 29.07%;width: 5.61%;height: 2.35%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: bold;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 72.85%;top: 20.02%;width: 8.00%;height: 4.95%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
大嫌いだし
奴は狂ってる!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 80.97%;top: 19.94%;width: 12.17%;height: 5.45%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 10.80%;top: 37.71%;width: 12.89%;height: 5.95%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
待って
それ果物?
持ってきた?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 10.56%;top: 58.41%;width: 12.29%;height: 6.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 10.20%;top: 64.45%;width: 12.89%;height: 7.63%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
衆人環視の中
そいつの頭を
一口で食うの?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 26.55%;top: 58.83%;width: 14.56%;height: 9.56%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
この会話から
抜け出せるなら
オレは頭を
切り落とし
てぇよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 27.98%;top: 68.97%;width: 13.01%;height: 9.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:35%;font-weight: bold;

text:
生は
良くないぜ。
調理法を
知らないと
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 45.29%;top: 59.08%;width: 17.06%;height: 6.71%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
あぁ調べて…
知っちまったよ。
タタラトゥスの
有名なレストランで
料理してもらう
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 78.10%;top: 58.75%;width: 15.99%;height: 12.74%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
別に
やらなくても
幸せだけど
腐らせるのも
悪い気が
してよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 43.74%;top: 76.85%;width: 12.77%;height: 11.40%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;

text:
ニモ、何で?
特別な物
なのに!
style: font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 67.36%;top: 76.77%;width: 9.79%;height: 4.78%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:10%;font-weight: bold;

text:
超レア
だから
皆にも分けた
かった
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 79.65%;top: 77.61%;width: 11.81%;height: 9.64%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius:40%;font-weight: normal;
